concept.title: Installing the Miramo DITA-OT plugin for the first time

conbody.p: These instructions relate to installing and integrating the Miramo DITA-OT plugin into an existing DITA-OT installation folder for the first time. For information on upgrading the plugin see .
To integrate with your XML authoring tool or DITA CMS, follow the instructions given by your vendor. See Appendices for information on and .
